name: Format\FadeInAnimation
description: The animation whereby a component fades into view.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Always fade_in for this animation type.

properties.name: initialAlpha
properties.description: The initial transparency of the component. Set initialAlpha to a value between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque).

properties.name: userControllable
properties.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the animation occurs in response to user action (true) or happens automatically (false).
